name: Carnage Noir
description:
CARNAGE NOIR is a seven-person student game modification project 

created from Jonathan Soderstrom’s Super Carnage, a GameMaker top-

down shooter prototype from 2004 that would go on to become Hotline

 Miami. The game had been considered lost for years until it was 

rediscovered in 2019. It was really exciting to be able to make a 

mod for a piece of forgotten gaming history!

Someone is on a warpath… but why? As the killer, you’ll brutally 

fight your way through three different locations, leaving no man 

standing. As the detective, you’ll search each murder scene for 

clues and attempt to piece together the story behind the violence. 

Who will survive the night?

MUSIC CREDITS

Music acquired through freemusicarchive.org and freesound.org

Be-Bop by Nicolas Chientaroli Trio

Frisco Bar at Midnight (TP 020) by Till Paradiso

Horror, Violin Tremolo Cluster A by InspectorJ
